overview: Marc is a 40 something photographer who loves younger women. Cherry is a 21 year old model who loves older men. Don't be fooled by her innocent looks, she just wants to fuck. Lolly loves to have fun with men. While working as a maid, she convinces her boss to give her his clothes so that she can wash them. Once naked, there is nothing better to do than having some fun. In need of an assistant, Philippe has hired a young photography student. Before checking if she knows how to take pictures, he wants to check if she can pose...
title: Saucy Young Women
